title: CornDocs
description: Create documentation for you next project with ease. CornDocs is a documentation template to help you get your next project off the ground quickly.

title: Okie.Design
short_description: Responsive components created with Tailwind and Love!
description: Various reponsive CSS components made using TailwindCSS. Modern designed easy to use CSS components to help rapidly create beautiful frontends.

title: FeastingTogether
short_description: Helping you and your friends find the perfect place to feast!
description: A web application that helps you and a group of friends find a place to eat. It uses NextJS so it can be a PWA. It uses SupaBase as the authenticator and the database. Lastly, it uses Tailwind for all the styling.
